short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select a name to search for it on Twitter, Facebook, Google, LinkedIn, Wikipedia, or CrunchBase.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever need to find someone on your favorite social media site? See someone in the news, and want his Wikipedia page right away? With Name Lookup, just select a name from any web page and we'll show you links to search for the name on Google, Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Wikipedia, or CrunchBase.
